UserComments.Comment: This is not a public charging point. You need to sign up with Brighton & hove council and receive an RFID tag and parking permit prior to usage. Parking/charging is also limited to 3 hours

AddressInfo.Title: Brighton and Hove City Council
AddressInfo.AddressLine1: Outside Caroline of Brunswick Public House

GeneralComments: You need to sign up with Brighton & hove council and receive an RFID tag and parking permit prior to usage. Parking/charging is also limited to 3 hours
